sentences: Greg Banaszak (born June 23, 1966) is an American saxophonist specializing in classical music and jazz.
He has performed in both styles through concerto performances, solo, and chamber music recitals and jazz festivals in the United States, Eastern and Western Europe, the Middle East, and Asia.

Banaszak received bachelor's degree from the Hartt School of Music, a master's degree from the Fryderyk Chopin University of Music in Warsaw, and an Artist Diploma from the Centre Musical dâ€™Annecy in France.
In 2001, he was appointed to the National Academy of Recording Arts and Sciences as a voting member for the annual Grammy Awards.
Recording primarily for Centaur since 1999, he has also produced albums for Chanson, Hyperion and Open Loop.
